Class ADrc

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.Filter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.audiofilters.AudioFilter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.audiofilters.adrc.ADrc
public class ADrc extends AudioFilter
This class implements FFmpeg's "adrc" filter. ATTENTION: this class is still being tested.

  • Method Details

    • setTransfer

      public void setTransfer(@NotNull @NotNull String val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the transfer expression. This value must be recognizable by FFmpeg.
      Parameters:
      val - The given transfer expression
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given transfer expression is null or an empty string or not a value recognized by FFmpeg

    • setAttack

      public void setAttack(int val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the attack value in milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      val - The given attack value in milliseconds
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given attack value is less than 1 or greater than 1000

    • setRelease

      public void setRelease(int val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the release value in milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      val - The given release value in milliseconds
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given release value is less than 5 or greater than 2000

    • addChannel

      public void addChannel(@NotNull @NotNull String channelID) throws InvalidArgumentException, MultiLanguageUnsupportedOperationException
      Adds a new channel ID to this filter.
      Parameters:
      channelID - The channel ID to be added
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given channel ID is null, an empty string or any value not recognized by FFmpeg
      MultiLanguageUnsupportedOperationException - If the channel identified by the given channel ID cannot be added
